mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_employee ( emp_name, gender, birth, email, desc_text, address ) VALUES ( #{empName}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{descText}, #{address} )
mapper.select: SELECT t.emp_id, t.emp_name, t.gender, t.birth, t.email, t.desc_text, t.address FROM t_employee t WHERE t.emp_id = #{empId}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_employee SET gender=#{gender}, emp_name=#{empName}, birth=#{birth}, email=#{email}, desc_text=#{descText}, address=#{address} WHERE emp_id = #{empId}
